item.title: The Wise Man
item.description: There is a man who looks at me where I walk my dog in the park. Outside the French embassy, up the street from the university where I teach, he stands in a long black coat and dark hat, peering over a significant beard maintained with care for decades, or so one can deduce from its broad, stately sweep.
